quotes.quote: When you come to a fork in the road, take it.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You can observe a lot by just watching.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It ain’t over till it’s over.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It’s like déjà vu all over again.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: No one goes there nowadays, it’s too crowded.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Baseball is 90% mental and the other half is physical.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: A nickel ain’t worth a dime anymore.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Always go to other people’s funerals, otherwise they won’t come to yours.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: We made too many wrong mistakes.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Congratulations. I knew the record would stand until it was broken.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I’m not hungry enough to eat six
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You wouldn’t have won if we’d beaten you.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I usually take a two-hour nap from one to four.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Never answer an anonymous letter.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Slump? I ain’t in no slump… I just ain’t hitting.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: How can you think and hit at the same time?
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The future ain’t what it used to be.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I tell the kids, somebody’s gotta win, somebody’s gotta lose. Just don’t fight about it. Just try to get better.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It gets late early out here.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: If the people don’t want to come out to the ballpark, nobody’s going to stop them.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: We have deep depth.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Pair up in threes.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Why buy good luggage, you only use it when you travel.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You’ve got to be very careful if you don’t know where you are going, because you might not get there.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: All pitchers are liars or crybabies.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Even Napoleon had his Watergate.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Bill Dickey is learning me his experience.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: He hits from both sides of the plate. He’s amphibious.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It was impossible to get a conversation going, everybody was talking too much.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I can see how he (Sandy Koufax) won twenty-five games. What I don’t understand is how he lost five.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I don’t know (if they were men or women fans running naked across the field). They had bags over their heads.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I’m a lucky guy and I’m happy to be with the Yankees. And I want to thank everyone for making this night necessary.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I’m not going to buy my kids an encyclopedia. Let them walk to school like I did.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: In baseball, you don’t know nothing.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I never blame myself when I’m not hitting. I just blame the bat and if it keeps up, I change bats. After all, if I know it isn’t my fault that I’m not hitting, how can I get mad at myself?
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I never said most of the things I said.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It ain’t the heat, it’s the humility.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: If you ask me anything I don’t know, I’m not going to answer.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I wish everybody had the drive he (Joe DiMaggio) had. He never did anything wrong on the field. I’d never seen him dive for a ball, everything was a chest-high catch, and he never walked off the field.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: So I’m ugly. I never saw anyone hit with his face.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Take it with a grin of salt.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: (On the 1973 Mets) We were overwhelming underdogs.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The towels were so thick there I could hardly close my suitcase.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Little League baseball is a very good thing because it keeps the parents off the streets.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Mickey Mantle was a very good golfer, but we weren’t allowed to play golf during the season; only at spring training.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You don’t have to swing hard to hit a home run. If you got the timing, it’ll go.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I’m lucky. Usually you’re dead to get your own museum, but I’m still alive to see mine.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: If I didn’t make it in baseball, I won’t have made it workin’. I didn’t like to work.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: If the world were perfect, it wouldn’t be.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: A lot of guys go, ‘Hey, Yog, say a Yogi-ism.’ I tell ’em, ‘I don’t know any.’ They want me to make one up. I don’t make ’em up. I don’t even know when I say it. They’re the truth. And it is the truth. I don’t know.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra
